details.body:
This page contains education and skills agreements for 2023 to 2024. For agreements relating to other years, see the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page.

Overview

The agreements contain a main terms and conditions body and schedules. You can find background on the structure of the education and skills agreements on the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page. 

Although structured slightly differently, the accountability agreements for relevant colleges and local authorities essentially adhere to the same principles as those set out above.

The table below sets out the changes made to the 2022 to 2023 agreements for 2023 to 2024:

Education and skills agreements: schedule of changes 2023 to 2024

PDF, 809 KB, 111 pages

This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology.

Request an accessible format.
If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email ESFA.GOVUK-ENQUIRIES@education.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.
